name: Phuture DeFi Index
description: The Phuture DeFi Index (PDI) offers exposure to the top crypto assets in the decentralised finance sector by market capitalisation. The assets in this index are part of the Ethereum ecosystem. The sector has seen exponential growth in recent years, and the following ones will mark an exciting adoption cycle by individual as well as institutional investors. PDI acts as a key element to any portfolio seeking to capture the next chapter of DeFi growth.
